data.name: Jubilee
data.description: Half mallrat, half fireworks factory, Jubilee uses her explosive plasmoid powers to blind dweebs while her allies totally strike.

starItems.name: Jubilee
starItems.description: Half mallrat, half fireworks factory, Jubilee uses her explosive plasmoid powers to blind dweebs while her allies totally strike.

1.description:
Attack primary target for <color=#86e619>70%</color> damage + <color=#86e619>10%</color> chance to apply <color=#fff568>Blind</color>.
In <color=#fff568>RAIDS</color>, always apply <color=#fff568>Blind</color>.

+<color=#86e619>30%</color> damage to primary target
+<color=#86e619>20%</color> chance to apply <color=#fff568>Blind</color>

1.description:
Apply <color=#fff568>Offense Up</color> to self and <color=#86e619>2</color> random <color=#fff568>X-MEN</color> allies.

Attack primary target for <color=#86e619>80%</color> damage.
Gain an assist at <color=#86e619>50%</color> Damage from <color=#86e619>3</color>-<color=#86e619>4</color> random <color=#fff568>ASTONISHING X-MEN</color> allies.
This attack is unavoidable and cannot be Blocked.

On Kill, spread <color=#86e619>1</color> negative effects from the primary target to all other enemies. This will not spread Stun.

2.description:
Apply <color=#fff568>Offense Up</color> to self and <color=#86e619>2</color> random <color=#fff568>X-MEN</color> allies.

Attack primary target for <color=#86e619>100%</color> damage.
Gain an assist at <color=#86e619>50%</color> Damage from <color=#86e619>3</color>-<color=#86e619>4</color> random <color=#fff568>ASTONISHING X-MEN</color> allies.
This attack is unavoidable and cannot be Blocked.

On Kill, spread <color=#86e619>1</color> negative effects from the primary target to all other enemies. This will not spread Stun.
2.nextUpgrade:
+<color=#86e619>30%</color> damage to primary target
Gain assist at <color=#86e619>50%</color> Damage from <color=#86e619>2</color> random non-summoned, non-<color=#fff568>ASTONISHING X-MEN</color> ally
On Kill, spread <color=#86e619>2</color> negative effects

3.description:
Apply <color=#fff568>Offense Up</color> to self and <color=#86e619>2</color> random <color=#fff568>X-MEN</color> allies.

Attack primary target for <color=#86e619>130%</color> damage.
Gain an assist at <color=#86e619>50%</color> Damage from <color=#86e619>3</color>-<color=#86e619>4</color> random <color=#fff568>ASTONISHING X-MEN</color> allies.
Call <color=#86e619>2</color> random non-summoned, non-<color=#fff568>ASTONISHING X-MEN</color> allies, at <color=#86e619>50%</color> Damage, to attack the primary target.
This attack is unavoidable and cannot be Blocked.

On Kill, spread <color=#86e619>2</color> negative effects from the primary target to all other enemies. This will not spread Stun.

4.description:
Apply <color=#fff568>Offense Up</color> to self and <color=#86e619>2</color> random <color=#fff568>X-MEN</color> allies.

Attack primary target for <color=#86e619>160%</color> damage.
Gain an assist at <color=#86e619>50%</color> Damage from <color=#86e619>3</color>-<color=#86e619>4</color> random <color=#fff568>ASTONISHING X-MEN</color> allies.
Call <color=#86e619>2</color> random non-summoned, non-<color=#fff568>ASTONISHING X-MEN</color> allies, at <color=#86e619>50%</color> Damage, to attack the primary target.
This attack is unavoidable and cannot be Blocked.

On Kill, spread <color=#86e619>2</color> negative effects from the primary target to all other enemies. This will not spread Stun.
4.nextUpgrade:
+<color=#86e619>40%</color> damage to primary target
On Kill, spread <color=#86e619>3</color> negative effects

5.description:
Apply <color=#fff568>Offense Up</color> to self and <color=#86e619>2</color> random <color=#fff568>X-MEN</color> allies.

Attack primary target for <color=#86e619>200%</color> damage.
Gain an assist at <color=#86e619>50%</color> Damage from <color=#86e619>3</color>-<color=#86e619>4</color> random <color=#fff568>ASTONISHING X-MEN</color> allies.
Call <color=#86e619>2</color> random non-summoned, non-<color=#fff568>ASTONISHING X-MEN</color> allies, at <color=#86e619>50%</color> Damage, to attack the primary target.
This attack is unavoidable and cannot be Blocked.

On Kill, spread <color=#86e619>3</color> negative effects from the primary target to all other enemies. This will not spread Stun.

6.description:
Apply <color=#fff568>Offense Up</color> to self and <color=#86e619>2</color> random <color=#fff568>X-MEN</color> allies.

Attack primary target for <color=#86e619>240%</color> damage.
Gain an assist at <color=#86e619>50%</color> Damage from <color=#86e619>3</color>-<color=#86e619>4</color> random <color=#fff568>ASTONISHING X-MEN</color> allies.
Call <color=#86e619>2</color> random non-summoned, non-<color=#fff568>ASTONISHING X-MEN</color> allies, at <color=#86e619>50%</color> Damage, to attack the primary target.
This attack is unavoidable and cannot be Blocked.

On Kill, spread <color=#86e619>3</color> negative effects from the primary target to all other enemies. This will not spread Stun.
6.nextUpgrade:
Apply <color=#fff568>Offense Up</color> to self and all <color=#fff568>X-MEN</color> allies
+<color=#86e619>60%</color> damage to primary target
Gain assist from all <color=#fff568>ASTONISHING X-MEN</color> allies

7.description:
Apply <color=#fff568>Offense Up</color> to self and all <color=#fff568>X-MEN</color> allies.

Attack primary target for <color=#86e619>300%</color> damage.
Gain an assist at <color=#86e619>50%</color> Damage from all <color=#fff568>ASTONISHING X-MEN</color> allies.
Call <color=#86e619>2</color> random non-summoned, non-<color=#fff568>ASTONISHING X-MEN</color> allies, at <color=#86e619>50%</color> Damage, to attack the primary target.
This attack is unavoidable and cannot be Blocked.

On Kill, spread <color=#86e619>3</color> negative effects from the primary target to all other enemies. This will not spread Stun.

1.description:
Attack primary target for <color=#86e619>100%</color> damage + <color=#86e619>10%</color> Piercing + reduce Speed Bar by <color=#86e619>10%</color> + apply <color=#fff568>Stun</color>.
Attack all other enemies for <color=#86e619>50%</color> damage + <color=#86e619>10%</color> Piercing.

Apply +<color=#86e619>1</color> <color=#fff568>Slow</color> to all enemies.
1.nextUpgrade:
+<color=#86e619>50%</color> damage to primary target
+<color=#86e619>25%</color> damage to secondary targets

2.description:
Attack primary target for <color=#86e619>150%</color> damage + <color=#86e619>10%</color> Piercing + reduce Speed Bar by <color=#86e619>10%</color> + apply <color=#fff568>Stun</color>.
Attack all other enemies for <color=#86e619>75%</color> damage + <color=#86e619>10%</color> Piercing.

Apply +<color=#86e619>1</color> <color=#fff568>Slow</color> to all enemies.
2.nextUpgrade:
+<color=#86e619>10%</color> Piercing to primary and secondary targets
Apply <color=#fff568>Offense Down</color> to all enemies

3.description:
Attack primary target for <color=#86e619>150%</color> damage + <color=#86e619>20%</color> Piercing + reduce Speed Bar by <color=#86e619>10%</color> + apply <color=#fff568>Stun</color>.

Apply <color=#fff568>Offense Down</color> to all enemies.

+<color=#86e619>50%</color> damage to primary target
Reduce Speed Bar of primary target by +<color=#86e619>5%</color>
+<color=#86e619>25%</color> damage to secondary targets

+<color=#86e619>50%</color> damage to secondary targets
Apply <color=#fff568>Offense Down</color> for <color=#86e619>2</color> turns to all enemies

6.description:
Attack primary target for <color=#86e619>300%</color> damage + <color=#86e619>30%</color> Piercing + reduce Speed Bar by <color=#86e619>15%</color> + apply <color=#fff568>Stun</color>.

Apply +<color=#86e619>1</color> <color=#fff568>Slow</color> to all enemies.

6.nextUpgrade:
+<color=#86e619>100%</color> damage to primary target
Reduce Speed Bar of primary target by +<color=#86e619>10%</color>
+<color=#86e619>50%</color> damage to secondary targets

7.description:
Attack primary target for <color=#86e619>400%</color> damage + <color=#86e619>50%</color> Piercing + reduce Speed Bar by <color=#86e619>25%</color> + apply <color=#fff568>Stun</color>.
Attack all other enemies for <color=#86e619>200%</color> damage + <color=#86e619>50%</color> Piercing.

Apply +<color=#86e619>1</color> <color=#fff568>Slow</color> to all enemies.
Apply <color=#fff568>Offense Down</color> for <color=#86e619>2</color> turns to all enemies.

1.description:
When an <color=#fff568>ASTONISHING X-MEN</color> ally drops below <color=#86e619>50%</color> Health, fill an ally Beast's Speed Bar by <color=#86e619>30%</color> + generate an Ability Energy for a random allied Beast.

On enemy Death, fill all <color=#fff568>ASTONISHING X-MEN</color> allies' Speed Bar by <color=#86e619>10%</color>.

On this character's and each <color=#fff568>X-MEN</color> ally's turn, apply <color=#fff568>Assist Now</color> to either self or a random <color=#fff568>X-MEN</color> ally.

Gain +<color=#86e619>20%</color> Max Health. <color=#fff568>X-MEN</color> allies gain +<color=#86e619>5%</color> Max Health.
<color=#fff568>ASTONISHING X-MEN</color> allies gain an additional +<color=#86e619>5%</color> Max Health.

In <color=#fff568>RAIDS</color>:
 > Gain +<color=#86e619>10%</color> Damage.
 > <color=#fff568>ASTONISHING X-MEN</color> allies gain +<color=#86e619>10%</color> Damage.
1.nextUpgrade:
In <color=#fff568>RAIDS</color>, gain +<color=#86e619>10%</color> Speed for self and <color=#fff568>ASTONISHING X-MEN</color> allies
+<color=#86e619>10%</color> Damage for self and <color=#fff568>ASTONISHING X-MEN</color> allies in <color=#fff568>RAIDS</color>

2.description:
When an <color=#fff568>ASTONISHING X-MEN</color> ally drops below <color=#86e619>50%</color> Health, fill an ally Beast Speed Bar by <color=#86e619>30%</color> + generate an Ability Energy for a random allied Beast.

On enemy Death, fill all <color=#fff568>ASTONISHING X-MEN</color> allies' Speed Bar by <color=#86e619>10%</color>.

2.nextUpgrade:
Fill Speed Bar by +<color=#86e619>5%</color> for <color=#fff568>ASTONISHING X-MEN</color> allies
+<color=#86e619>5%</color> Max Health for self, <color=#fff568>X-MEN</color>, and <color=#fff568>ASTONISHING X-MEN</color> allies
